EmailTemplate.name: 16.ComColl.SessionBC.none.D.G.E.2426.Email 1 - IHS Trend Report
EmailTemplate.subject: IHS Markit Special Report: SBCs Move to the Cloud
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Get your copy of a new IHS Markit report on SBCs by Diane Myers View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Migrating SBCs to the Cloud IHS Markit Report: Insights on SBC trends by Diane Myers
SBCs are a critical element of next generation voice networks.
Today, communication service providers are steadily migrating their SBCs to the cloud for service agility and operational efficiencies. In this special report written by Diane Myers, Senior Research Director at IHS Markit, learn more about:
- How communication service providers are moving SBCs to NFV - The top drivers for SBCs in NFV environments - The most critical features of software-only SBCs in NFV
Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Communications and Collaboration Marketing, Nokia Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
